faq.question: What percentage does YouTube take?
faq.answer: YouTube takes 30%, you keep 70% of membership revenue. This is standard for platform-hosted memberships. Consider value of YouTube's infrastructure.

faq.question: How much should I charge?
faq.answer: Most channels offer $4.99 base tier. Higher tiers $9.99-$24.99 for premium perks. Start simple, add tiers as community grows. Research your niche.

faq.question: What perks work best?
faq.answer: Exclusive/early content, members-only chat badges, custom emotes, direct access (Discord, streams). Tangible value viewers can't get otherwise.

faq.question: How to get first members?
faq.answer: Ask! Promote genuinely to engaged community. Offer compelling value. First members often come from most active commenters and stream chatters.
